OOC: Yan, you didnt post that Scyther avoided the 25 shots Megatron did?


Megatron just moved out of the way of Prowls lashing, but what he looked
down to see suprised him. This wasnt eh Iron Raptor he had seen over the
video screen, and he knew the Matrix was at work. How many times must it
meddle in their affairs, he then had a look of shock on his face as the
lightning closed around him, and shrunk into him. He quickly fired a
blast of his raw fusion energy downwards, and the crossfire hit,
emmiting a large light of energy as the two forces met. Then it cleared,
and Megatron was left floating there, covering his face, smoke lifting
off of his body. 

As his arms moved away to reveal his face, it had a grimace on it of
pure anger. He landed on the ground a few meters away from this new
Prime. He pointed accusingly, "YOU, you are pathetic for challenging me.
Megatron DOES NOT YIELD TO KNOW ONE" he screamed, his rage apparent.
"HOW DARE YOU. I AM OLDER THAN YOUR CREATOR, I AM MEGATRON. Do you have
any idea how many holders of the matrix I have crushed in my 20 million
year life time? DO YOU" he screamed, furious at the audacity of this
rookie Prime. "HOW DARE YOU"
